text: Groesbeek is a town and former municipality in the province of Gelderland, the Netherlands. On 1 January 2015, the former municipality merged with Millingen aan de Rijn and Ubbergen. The larger area was known as Groesbeek until 1 January 2016, when its name was changed to Berg en Dal. == References == Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Former municipalities of Gelderland Category:Settlements in Gelderland Category:Berg en Dal
title: Groesbeek
